title: Interpretation of dreams about buying meat from a butcher and a butcher shop

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing buying meat from a butcher in a dream through the website roy2a.com. A butcher is defined as the person who sells or cuts meat, either through a private store or does this work on holidays and special occasions. Seeing a butcher in a dream is what we will talk about. Through this article, I will explain the most important interpretations provided by major dream interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, and Ibn Shaheen, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing a butcher in a dream. Seeing a butcher with blood in a dream indicates disagreements and conflicts in the life of the dreamer. Seeing an unknown butcher in a dream indicates that I was exposed to a type of Of injustice in his life. As for seeing a butcher in a patient’s dream? It is a sign of his recovery and imminent recovery. Seeing a butcher in a dream indicates exposure to a kind of injustice, slander, and restrictions in life matters. Seeing a butcher shop in a dream that was clean and not stained with blood is considered a praiseworthy vision. See another interpretation. Interpretation of seeing a butcher in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin says that seeing a butcher in a dream has many connotations, which could be a sign of the angel of death. As for dreaming of a butcher covered in blood? It is an indication of bad things in the dreamer’s life, such as gossip and trouble. Seeing a butcher in a dream It denotes disputes, wars, and the outbreak of strife. What is worth noting is that seeing a famous butcher, a fortune teller, in a dream is better than seeing an unknown butcher. Seeing a famous butcher in a dream, its interpretation depends on the importance of knowledge, the name of the person, his characteristics, the nature of his relationship with the dreamer, etc. As for seeing an unknown butcher in a dream? It is a sign. On injustice, rebellion, or hostility. Seeing a son slaughtering his father in a dream. A good vision indicates justice and good treatment. Seeing a butcher slaughtering an animal that prevents you from slaughtering it indicates exposure to injustice in life. Interpretation of seeing a butcher in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a butcher shop in a single woman’s dream. A good vision indicates abundance. Luck and happiness. As for the vision of going to the butcher in a single woman’s dream? And seeing meat and not buying is a hateful vision. If you see a single woman working in a butcher shop, it is an indication of the approach of her marriage or the opportunity to travel. Interpretation of seeing a butcher in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a butcher in a dream for a married person and this person He was her husband, so it is great news of livelihood and wealth in their lives. Seeing a butcher shop in a married woman’s dream is considered a good vision that indicates a good life and the approach of happy news. Watching a butcher cutting meat for a married woman in a dream, this is an indication that she is facing a problem. Seeing meat Rotten in a dream indicates that she is a married woman in the sorrows and worries that she is exposed to in her life. Seeing buying meat from an unknown butcher in a married woman’s dream indicates falling into sadness and distress. Interpretation of seeing a butcher in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a butcher in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates the health of herself and her fetus. We are happy that We show you the place to receive your dreams “Butcher’s Dream Interpretation” through the comments and the dream team will interpret your dream, answer and communicate with you

title: Dirt in a dream and the interpretation of throwing dirt on the face

preview.html: Dreaming of dirt in a dream is similar to other dreams whose interpretation varies according to the condition of the viewer, and its interpretation also varies according to the nature of the dream itself, and dirt in a dream has many meanings that vary between positive and negative, and you will. Learn about all its cases through this article accurately. Dirt in a dream The interpretation of a dream about dirt in a dream indicates that the dreamer will earn a lot of money, and if he is suffering from distress, this vision is good news for him about the proximity of relief. Ibn Shaheen says: Whoever sees in his dream that his house is full of dirt, this indicates that he will obtain his livelihood without fatigue and hardship. If the dreamer shakes the dust from his house in a dream, this is evidence that he will spend his money excessively, so he should pay attention and God knows best. Dirt in a dream for Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing dirt in a dream means goodness and blessings in livelihood and money, and the gift of dirt in a dream also indicates money and livelihood, but if the sleeper sees dust falling from the sky, this is evidence of his pains and judgments that he is going through and God knows best. And if he sees that he is collecting money from dirt, this is good news for him. If a couple sees wet soil in their dream, this means that they will have children, God willing, and the man who sees himself hitting the ground with his hand in his dream indicates that He will soon earn a lot of money from the work he will do. He takes possession of. Dirt in a dream Fahd Al-Osaimi Fahd Al-Osaimi indicates that seeing dirt on clothes indicates hardship and suffering. Seeing him eating dirt in a dream means that you reach dreams and achieve them, and seeing winds and storms carrying dust in the air means sadness and worry that the dreamer suffers from, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing dirt in a dream by Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi says that dirt in a dream indicates that the dreamer will get good and abundant sustenance, but after fatigue and effort. If the sleeper sees that he is cleaning dirt from the house and then picking it up, this is good for him that he will get a lot of money through his wife, while the man sees that he is digging dirt inside. The dream indicates his imminent death, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Dirt in a single woman's dream If the girl is in conflict with her fiancé, then seeing dirt in her house in a dream means canceling her engagement to this young man because he does not suit her. Seeing dirt on the clothes of unmarried women in a dream indicates that her marriage is approaching. If the girl in the dream sweeps dirt and throws it away, this indicates that she will rush into a situation in the future that requires her to be more careful and she must be more careful in spending money and be careful in what she spends. Seeing dirt in a dream for unmarried women sometimes indicates the difficulty they face in their studies or work. Dirt in a married woman's dream A married woman's dream of putting dirt on her head indicates the crises that she and her husband will go through, and she must beware of those who haunt her life and hate her. If a married woman dreams that she is picking up dirt, this indicates

title: Interpretation of seeing roses in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing roses in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, roses are among the beautiful natural plants that combine the beauty of form and the beauty of smell. They are used to express love, attention, decoration, and obtaining more luxurious perfumes. Seeing them in a dream has pleasant meanings, hints, and other disturbing interpretations, especially if it is in the form of A rose is not beautiful and is full of thorns or weak leaves, so in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing roses in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing roses in a dream Roses are one of the things we dream about most. We feel comfortable and happy and that life is good, but what about interpretations? The dreamer seeing roses, we learn about the interpretation of this dream through the interpretations of scholars that emerged from the various sciences that they knew, but these interpretations are still in the knowledge of the unseen, so let us go. Ibn Sirin believes that if a person dreams in a dream of placing a wreath of flowers on his head, this indicates However, if he sees himself in a dream picking roses, this indicates that he will suffer from a long period of time spent in anxiety and sadness. Likewise, if the dreamer dreams that he is picking a white rose in a dream, this means that he is approaching... A chaste woman without her desire. And if he sees that he took a black rose from someone, this indicates the death of someone close to him or that he will face many problems. Likewise, the interpretation of roses in a dream may differ depending on the color that appears in them. If it is blue, it means comfort, peace and tranquility. Interpretation of a dream about seeing roses in a dream If a person dreams of silver roses, this indicates the occurrence of many happy occasions, as well as those that indicate advancement in job positions and the fulfillment of ambitions. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing yellow roses in A dream indicates that a person is suffering from stages of failure in his life, in addition to his inability to achieve dreams. If the dreamer dreams that he smells yellow roses, this indicates his closeness to a sick woman. It should be noted that picking roses is one of the beautiful dreams that indicates that the dreamer will reap good things. In his life.Interpretation of the dream of seeing red roses in a dream. Interpretation by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the wife’s seeing a red rose in a dream as a gift to her husband in relation to improving the relationship between them and that she feels love and positive emotions, but if there are disagreements between the two parties, this indicates the husband’s anger at his wife. But whoever sees that he is collecting roses, this indicates that he will reap well. Therefore, if a girl sees red roses with thorns in her dream, this means that she will fall into an emotional relationship that ends in a serious shock, as it is that journey full of problems and difficulties. But if the dreamer sees in a dream If he sees roses on the tree, this indicates the arrival of a new child. Also, if the wife sees red roses in a dream, this indicates her husband’s intense love for her, and God knows best. Each type of flower and each color has a different meaning and connotation. Not all interpretations are mentioned

title: Interpretation of wool in a dream: Wearing woolen clothes in a dream

preview.html: We explain to you that burning white, black, colored, rough and fine wool, wearing a woolen dress and shirt, knitting wool in a dream for single, married and pregnant women, spinning sheep’s wool with a hook.Interpretation of wool in a dreamThe basic interpretation of the meaning of wool in a dream is money and livelihood, or happiness and abundance, according to the oldest religious approaches Psychological and modern. Wool in a dream represents great and abundant wealth that the dreamer collects and comes to the dreamer after hard work and effort. Whoever sees in his dream that he sleeps in wool, he will be influenced by money or money on the part of the woman who gets married or inherits. Whoever sees in his dream that wool is burning, that is, interprets it as Corruption in religion or at work, and burned wool leads to money and effort being wasted. As for the man who sees in his dream that his clothing is made of wool, he lives among scholars and jurists, and they said that wearing wool is piety, asceticism, knowledge, and Sufism. Whoever sees in his dream that he has a dog and dresses him in wool, this is his interpretation. Whoever dreams that a lion or tiger wears wool, this is his interpretation of justice. The ruler and the prosperity of the state or emirate. Interpretation of wool in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees that she is wearing a wool dress, this is her interpretation of the adequacy of display and living. If a married woman dreams that her house, wardrobe, or room is full of wool, then this is interpreted as a diet. Wide and abundant money. White wool indicates a good halal diet. It is not good in dreams for a woman to see that she is eating, chewing or swallowing wool, because the dream in this context can indicate problems and fears, and perhaps even tragedies and sorrows. Interpretation of wool in a dream for a woman Single Wool in a girl's dream is much better if she sees that she is wearing it, buying it, or sleeping and sitting on it. Wool can express positive feelings and self-confidence. Colored wool in visions for a single girl symbolizes the brightness of the future and life. Wool indicates marriage or engagement. If a girl sees that it is a cover for her, this means that you see the girl as if she is covered with piles of wool, and fine wool in a girl’s dream indicates happiness. Coarse wool is a sign of piety and religiosity. For a pregnant woman, wool symbolizes good things and good news, especially if she sees herself wearing it or sleeping It is. The best type of wool in dreams is white sheep wool, because it indicates good health and complete wellness. Interpretation of soft wool in a dream. Perhaps soft wool indicates ease of surrender and kindness, as well as seeing wool covering the walls of the house or window curtains. Interpretation of black wool in a dream. Black wool may indicate To a male child, wool is a symbol of money, trade, profit, or endeavor. If one sees that he is washing or cleaning wool, then perhaps this is his interpretation of the purification of money through zakat, charity, or protection from usury. Interpretation of washing wool in a dream Washing wool with water indicates a change in living conditions. If a man sees his wife washing wool, this is his interpretation of a new source of livelihood and is often related to trade. If she sees bitterness

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing falling in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about falling dreams and seeing falling indicates adversity and difficulties facing the dreamer, as it can indicate fear, anxiety and recurring hesitation in the life of the dreamer, and interpretation of dreams for single, married, pregnant women and men who see dreams in dreams, signs of falling into a pit, that is, falling into the mud, which It means a problem or problem, the scene of falling from the roof of the house, the interpretation of falling and death, falling or falling is a defect between people before they fall to the ground in reality. . About falling in a dream, this is a vision that many people want and do not know the correct interpretation, so today we will understand this dream in detail through this article. A dream about falling or falling indicates psychological pressures, experiences and difficulties that the dreamer faces. Interpretation of a dream about falling by Ibn Sirin: Explain that the vision The dream comes from an unpleasant vision, which indicates that the goal is out of reach and a feeling of despair and disappointment. The dream in which he fell in a dream is evidence of a disaster that may make it difficult to get rid of and difficult to overcome. Seeing the rise and rise of dreams indicates the passage of crises and obstacles, the solution of problems and the disappearance of Sadness and eliminating tension. The dreamer sees his face falling in the dream, which indicates failure before the enemy and a feeling of humiliation, weakness and humiliation before the enemy. The illusion of falling face in the dream proves the severe ordeal that the Messenger is going through, but it ends quickly by the command of God Almighty. Seeing a dream of falling into hell in a woman’s dream warned her that she has committed many sins and must repent. Seeing yourself Falling into unclean water in a woman’s dream proves that there is someone who hates her and is trying to trap her in a disaster, and she must warn the people around her. Muddy dreams in a married woman’s dreams are disasters and indicators of her family and she must take care of them. Seeing her falling down the stairs in a married woman’s dream means that she is living in pain and sadness because a lot of Disagreements with her husband may lead to divorce. A dream dreamed by a married woman shows a sense of instability, fear of the future, and over-thinking of her family. title: Interpretation of a dream about cutting a pearl necklace in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cutting a pearl necklace in a dream In case you are looking for an interpretation of a dream about cutting a pearl necklace in a dream, there are a large number of clues and interpretations of dreams, and we find that scholars and scholars in general are diligent people looking for interpretations, and the site managers do not interfere in the interpretations, but rather they Sent for the interpretations of scholars. Interpretation of a dream of cutting a pearl necklace in a dream. Scissors of a pearl necklace in a dream may indicate one’s opponents, during which the dreamer will enter that period, and God knows best. If someone sees that he is cutting a pearl necklace, this may indicate the end of the relationship with a person He was close to him and away from him. Everyone who dreams of cutting a pearl necklace in a dream may indicate the separation of one of his family members at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about car parts in a dream. Anyone who sees car parts in a dream can indicate positive changes that are occurring in The dreamer's life during this period. A person's dream of car spare parts may indicate the good health that the dreamer enjoyed during that period. If one sees himself buying car spare parts, this may indicate the end of the problems that the visionary was facing in his life during those days. It is possible that seeing car spare parts in a dream indicates recovery from a problem that the dreamer may face in his life at that time, and God knows best. Whoever dreams of cutting bread may indicate good things that will come to the dreamer in the future. That time, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a corpse in a dream by Ibn Sirin and its meanings

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a corpse in a dream: Dreaming of the deceased giving money or clothes to single, married, and pregnant women is one of the dreams that many people have. Because whoever dreams that he is eating with the dead will prolong his life, and whoever sees death giving him something from the beloved of the world, this is better for him in terms of He doesn't hope. If he gives him decent clothing, then he is poor, and if he gives him dirty clothing, then he is committing immorality, and if he gives him food, he will receive honorable food from him that he did not expect. Does giving a dead person in a dream an indication of good or evil? What does it mean if the dead person gives the dreamer a child or a phone? All of these questions we will find their answers by interpreting the dream of giving the dead in a dream in detail. Seeing the dead giving the living is evidence of good fortune and good luck, because it indicates the disappearance of sadness and distress and the improvement of material conditions. Interpretation of the dream of giving the dead in Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of giving the dead in The dream is considered one of the dreamer’s praiseworthy dreams. The interpretation of the dream that he gave to the deceased in the dream and it was a relative of the fortuneteller, such as an uncle or father, indicates that the fortuneteller will receive a large inheritance. Also, seeing the deceased in a dream is a sign that he will get rid of worries and problems in His life. Seeing the living giving the dead a certain thing, but he refuses it, this indicates the anger of the dead towards the dreamer. Interpretation of the dream of giving coins to a dead person in a dream is an unpleasant vision for the fortuneteller, as it is evidence of his failure to achieve his goals and aspirations. Also, seeing the deceased giving coins Metal in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is suffering from worries and sorrows in his life. Seeing the deceased giving shoes is evidence of the extent of the dreamer’s love for that deceased person. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing hunger in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of giving the deceased to an unmarried woman. The interpretation of seeing the dead in A dream about him giving fresh bread to an unmarried woman is evidence of good news that she married a good, righteous man. Seeing the deceased in a dream giving the unmarried girl a new dress means that she will gain joy and happiness in her life. Rejecting the gift of the deceased in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence that she is suffering from Worries and sorrows. Giving dead money to an unmarried girl is evidence of the abundance of sustenance and goodness that she will receive in her life. Interpretation of a dream that a dead woman gave to a married woman. Interpretation of giving a dead body in a dream to a married woman indicates an imminent pregnancy for her. Interpretation of a dream in which a dead person gives a child in a dream to a married woman A good vision for her, because it indicates the death of a son or daughter. See also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing the bosom of a dead person in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream of offering a dead woman to a pregnant woman. Giving a dead person in a dream to a pregnant woman indicates that she will give birth to good offspring, and giving the pregnant woman money A dead person indicates the abundance of livelihood that she will receive in her life. Interpretation of a dream about handing over a dead person to a divorced woman. The interpretation of giving a dead person to a divorced woman in a dream is evidence of her relationship with another person with whom she will obtain happiness and joy as compensation for the misfortunes she saw.

title: Interpretation of a dream about marrying an ex-lover in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of marrying an ex-lover In a dream, a large number of scholars believe that the dream of marrying a lover with whom you have a love relationship, so seeing a wedding is generally interpreted according to the nature of the dream and the nature of the dream. The case of the forecaster, and we will explain this to you through our article: Interpretation of a dream about marrying a lover, according to psychologists and Ibn Sirin. Follow us. You dream of returning to a former lover or husband. Sometimes this dream can indicate that you miss your ex-lover or former lover, but this does not mean that you want The relationship returns to reality or you wake up thinking about it, it instead means that you want to regain the feeling of closeness and connection to a successful relationship with another person, but if you are currently in a relationship, the dream may be a signal from the subconscious to evaluate this relationship and compare it to a previous failed relationship. Interpretation of a dream about marrying a lover by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets a dream about a girl marrying her lover and her desire to move forward in life. He summarizes it in several points: Ibn Sirin claims that seeing a girl with someone she loves and the existence of an emotional relationship between them is a manifestation of divine providence that the dreamer receives from God Almighty. For a girl or man who finds himself marrying people they do not know, other than those they love and with whom they have an emotional relationship by decree. In fact, this may indicate the approaching day of death and the end of the Prophet’s life, because it is a dream with a great interpretation. Ibn Sirin suggested that this vision may be from a fugitive desire, so the subconscious mind takes it and analyzes it as a dream that candidates see as a kind of self-realization, which comes from thinking a lot about this The matter, especially before. Sleeps. Seeing your ex-wife with another womanIf you dream that your ex-boyfriend has married another woman, then emotions are hers in your dream that determines the meaning of the dream. If you are feeling positive about the dream, it may mean that you have left the past behind you. You are a bride at a wedding with another person present, your lover or ex-lover, which means that you are ready to enter into a new relationship. Read also. In conclusion, we explained the interpretation of the dream of marrying an ex-lover in a dream. We hope that you like the article.

title: What is the interpretation of killing a snake in a dream?

preview.html: Many people are looking to know the interpretation of killing a snake in a dream, as seeing a snake in a dream is one of the disturbing and disturbing visions for its owners, because it is a deadly animal that is characterized by betrayal and quick treachery. Movement, and if a person sees in his dream that he is killing a snake, he wants to know what this dream means for good or evil, and the interpretation of each vision varies according to its details and the condition of the dreamer, and through the following lines in the encyclopedia we will learn about the most important interpretations of killing a snake in a dream. Interpretation Killing a snake in a dream. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of killing a snake in a dream. The scholar Ibn Shaheen says: If a person dreams that he is killing a black snake, then his dream indicates his salvation from an enemy who has all evil. As for whoever sees in his dream that he killed a black snake in his bed and got married, this means that he will divorce. His wife. To dream of a black snake in the kitchen is evidence of the dreamer’s distress and poverty, but if she is killed in the dream, this is good news that the dreamer’s condition will change for the better and he will be saved from his narrow livelihood. Interpretation of a dream about killing a snake by Ibn Sirin. From the point of view of the scholar Ibn Sirin, whoever dreams of slaughtering a snake after trying to attack it, his dreams indicate that someone is conspiring against him. Seeing a snake being slaughtered in a dream shows the dreamer’s ability to annihilate his enemies, get rid of them, and change his life for the better. If someone dreams that he He hits a black snake and tries to get rid of it, but he does not succeed. This means that the dreamer is trying to get rid of some of his bad qualities, but he cannot. Seeing a snake in a dream and killing an unmarried woman. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that there is a snake that tried to bite her, but she was able to kill it, Her dream shows her salvation from a major problem that she will face in her life. A single woman who dreams of a snake without being afraid of it indicates the presence of a malicious person in her life, and this vision is a warning to stay away from him. An unmarried woman who kills a snake in her dream indicates that she will succeed in her love life and that things Good things come their way. Whoever dreams of killing a white snake, the dream indicates that she will fail in her love life, and if she gets engaged, her engagement will end. One of the most promising visions for a single woman is her dream of eating a snake after killing it, because it symbolizes that she will soon gain happiness in her life. Seeing a snake in a dream And killing a married woman. The black snake in a married woman’s dream symbolizes the entry of an evil person into her life and will create many problems for her. The vision may indicate her salvation from her worries and problems arising from the presence of people who hate her. Whoever sees in her dream that she saved her husband from the bite of a snake and killed him, then her dreams indicate If a pregnant woman dreams that she is killing a snake, the dream indicates her salvation from a problem in her life, her victory over her enemies, and her recovery from a disease she suffers from. It may indicate that she will help her husband get rid of some problems that may affect him greatly. Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream of killing a snake. Her dreams mean that she will be saved from the problems of her pregnancy, the death of her childbirth, and the safety of herself and her fetus. The presence of a snake in a pregnant woman’s house in a dream is a warning of the need to stay away from evil people.

title: A detailed interpretation of seeing the private part in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing nudity in a dream? It is forbidden to show nudity in front of others, and whoever does this has committed a great sin and a sin against God, and many of us see in our dream that our private parts are not covered, which makes us anxious and afraid as a sin. The result of this dream and this vision. It has many meanings and connotations that differ depending on the viewer, and we will refer to this article with all the interpretations that we received regarding this dream in detail. Seeing private parts in a dream Its appearance in a dream has many interpretations, including bad and good. Some interpreted it as a sign of abundant goodness, and some interpreted it as an indication of scandals and hidden revelations, especially major secret matters, and this matter depends on the dreamer and his psychological and social state at the time of seeing it. Seeing the nakedness of others in a dream by Ibn Sirin. He mentioned in his interpretations that the wife who sees Her husband naked in a dream is evidence of goodness and abundance for her and her family and the happiness that overwhelms her. If a married woman appears in a dream and is unknown to her, this means that she will receive goodness and food in the near future, God willing, from her. A married woman’s clothes for a long saddle and in front of him is a person she knows well, and his nakedness is visible. , This means that he will receive a lot of goodness and food in the coming seasons, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. If one sees in a dream that he is sleeping and someone comes next to him while he is naked, this means that the dreamer will get a perfect job in the near future. Whoever sees in his dream That he is sitting quietly in a public place surrounded by many people without a jacket, this indicates that the dreamer will spend a very enjoyable time in the coming periods. A young man seeing his lover or fiancée in a dream revealing her nakedness shows the love and honesty between them and that their marriage will take place soon and their lives will be filled with love and understanding. (God willing). Private parts in an unmarried woman’s dream: Seeing her in one dream means that the date of her marriage to a person who enjoys a great deal of love and respect is approaching. If a girl sees in her dream that she is looking at a naked person, this indicates the famous and wonderful status that she will acquire. But if she sees herself Holding her nakedness, this indicates the presence of someone who can admire and love her. Whoever dreams that he is sitting with a friend and sees a woman stripped of her clothes, this indicates that he will marry that person very soon, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing a naked man in a dream for a single woman. A dream was interpreted Seeing the nakedness of an unmarried person is evidence of her concern for others and her concern for their feelings, as well as providing help and assistance to those around her. Interpretation of seeing a naked man in a dream for an unmarried woman, according to Ibn Sirin. The vision in her dream, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, is evidence of her close marriage to someone she cares about, who He will have more love and respect for her, and she will live a stable and peaceful life with him. Interpretation of seeing nudity in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees nudity in her dream and she is a stranger to her, this indicates happiness and joy that will come to her soon from an unknown source. As for the catch in a dream, it is evidence of a journey
